abstract: After the National Book Foundation mistakenly includes Lauren Myracle's young-adult novel "Shine" on the shortlist and says it can stay in competition, it asks the author to withdraw and she agrees.
snippet: After the National Book Foundation mistakenly includes Lauren Myracle's young-adult novel "Shine" on the shortlist and says it can stay in competition, it asks the author to withdraw and she agrees.
lead_paragraph: In case there was any doubt that the annual announcements of literary prizes can yield high drama, a finalist for the National Book Awards curtly withdrew from the shortlist on Monday, five days after she was mistakenly named a finalist by the National Book Foundation.

headline.main: She Coulda Been a Contender: National Book Award Finalist Withdraws After Mistake
